name: Rat Trap
description:
Rat Trap is a small and addictive puzzle game, where your role is to protect your reserve of cheese by carefully positioning blocking elements to prevent the rat from reaching it and eventually trap it.

During your progression, you will gain new capabilities that will help you protect your cheese in a more effective way. At the beginning you can use cans to block access to the cheese, but as you manage to solve more and more difficult levels, new elements will appear:

  • Underground tunnels that the rat can use to move faster
  • Planks that you can use to cover tunnel entrances
  • Fake cheese that can lure the rat on a wrong direction
  • A hammer to stun the rat and gain some extra time

Be careful, the rat is smart and will try everything to eat the cheese! Have fun!

Rat Trap is entirely hand-crafted, without the use of any engine or off-the-shelf assets. It is my first game, and I tried my best to do everything by myself. You can learn more about the design and story of Rat Trap on the official Rat Trap page.
